PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-00881998-01-290,  LAB,  ,  , 
PrecisAppointment of DAVID P. SILCOX, of Toronto, Ontario, as Chairperson of the Canadian Artists and Producers Professional Relations Tribunal, on a part-time basis, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective March 1, 1998.
